params.name: -r, --remote REMOTE
params.desc: git remote of app to run command against

subcommands.name: domains:add DOMAIN
subcommands.desc: add a custom domain to an app

subcommands.name: domains:clear
subcommands.desc: remove all custom domains from an app

subcommands.name: domains:remove DOMAIN
subcommands.desc: remove a custom domain from an app

subcommands.name: domains:wait HOSTNAME
subcommands.desc: wait for domain to be active for an app
